snippet: The energy and environment ministers seek to ban shale gas and oil drilling for commercial purposes.
abstract: Germany's ministers for energy and environment are seeking ban on shale gas and oil drilling over next seven years because of worries that practice could pollute drinking water and damage the environment; Chancellor Angela Merkel's government had planned to introduce legislation to regulate hydraulic fracturing, bringing end to de facto moratorium on practice.
lead_paragraph: The energy and environment ministers seek to ban shale gas and oil drilling for commercial purposes.

headline.main: German Proposal Seeks to Sharply Curtail Fracking
headline.print_headline: Worries About Environment Prompt German Proposal to Sharply Curtail Fracking
